content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate factory at position(x=-52.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (x=61.0, y=-52.0) with 1 coal as fuel and producing copper plates.
- Furnace at position (x=63.0, y=-52.0) with 5 coal as fuel and producing copper plates.
- Furnace at position (x=65.0, y=-52.0) with 40 coal as fuel but currently has no ingredients to smelt.

### Copper ore mine at position(x=-28.5, y=-61.5)
Consists of the following activities:
- Harvesting copper ore from the specified position.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace has enough capacity to accept the items being inserted. If the furnace result is full, it cannot accept more items.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Repeated errors with furnace ingredient availability
- Check that you have the necessary ingredients available before attempting to insert them into the furnace. If the furnace has no ingredients to smelt, it will not operate.
